alert.note: Alert for Blaine (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 30 at 2:07PM MDT until further notice by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Idaho... Big Wood River at Hailey affecting Blaine County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/pocatello. ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding caused by snowmelt continues. * WHERE...Big Wood River at Hailey. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 5.0 feet, Street flooding will occur along Cedar, War Eagle, and Della Vista Drives in the lower subdivisions in Hailey and Riverview drive in Bellevue. Draper Preserve in Hailey is inaccessible. Water may be over some secondary roads in West Ketchum (Wood River Drive). Gimlet subdivision will have flooding issues. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:45 PM MDT Sunday the stage was 4.1 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage Tuesday morning, then gradually increase to a crest around 5.6 feet on or around Friday, May 05. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Action stage is 3.7 feet. - Flood stage is 5.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm MDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Big Wood River Hailey 5.0 4.1 Sun 12 pm MD 4.9 5.1 5.1 &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route.
